Game won't allow me to use a controller. I've tried everything to get a controller to work but it won't allow it. It either doesn't work at all or won't allow certain buttons to work as intended. It constantly gets stuck believing it's a PS4 controller and won't give me an option to reset it or do anything of the nature to restore what it should be at. Other Xbox controller layouts will not work and make the game unplayable with a controller. I wanted to get into the swing of things, but I don't want to have to use the keyboard if I don't have to.
